Dialogue.Page: This planet is tidally locked; one side always faces the sun and the other is always dark!
The Attlerock is tidally locked to Timber Hearth, but there's nothing back home that's tidally locked to the sun.
Half this planet is covered in a giant ice sheet, the other is a scorching desert!
Most of the life here is clinging to the transition between "day" and "night," the twilight zone I guess.
Imagine living under a permanent sun set!
